arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart secured a resounding 4-0 victory Augsburg's 10 men, the Swabians ending a six-game home losing streak thanks to goals from Atakan Karazor, Nick Woltemade, Enzo Millot, and Ermedin Demirović. Stuttgart players, including Atakan Karazor, Jamie Leweling, and Ermedin Demirović, celebrate .

arts.ttl: Stuttgart smash ten-man Augsburg to climb into top half
arts.sum: Comfortable win for Stuttgart in their last home game of the season.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs. Augsburg preview: Two closely-matched sides face off
arts.sum: Two teams separated by a point will face off when Stuttgart welcome Augsburg to the MHPArena for Sunday’s Bundesliga contest.
